valid: For the period 06:00 (UTC) on Sun 28 Dec 2025 to 06:00 (UTC) on Mon 29 Dec 2025
general_synopsis: Low Trafalgar 1002 slow-moving, filling 1012 by midnight tonight. High Hebrides 1043 expected 250 miles southwest of Iceland 1039 by same time
